ygData.messageBody:
yes, absolutely. acutally all the tanks at our raids are either barbarians
or ogres, so they don't need shields. and when Vox gets low (15% or so)
everyone starts screaming STUN, and the clerics and wizards cast stuns only.
i have no sense of direction or zones, but i think we fight her on the ramp
to her lair. wherever it is, it is near that rock that moves when you click
on it. and avoid the bear pit at all costs unless you love difficult CRs.
for nagafen we fight him near the stairs to his lair. also for both
dragons, we load up groups. we don't balance them out. my group is usually
4 tanks, a cleric and me. maybe 3 tanks, 2 clerics, and me. melee damage
is the key to killing them, not spell damage. so you want to keep your
tanks alive, which means cleric and bard resists. am i making sense? i
usually just do what people tell me =)

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
